item.title: Clojure Destructuring
item.description: Destructuring allows to extract values from datastructures and bind them to symbols without explicitly looping/traversing the datastructure. It allows concise and simple coding. Sequential Destructuring Provides vector of symbols to bind by position. Syntax: [symbol another-symbol] [“value” “another-value”] (def listNumbers[7 8 9 10 11]) ;;Bind a, b, c to first 3 values in stuff (let [[a b c] listNumbers] (list (+ a b) (+ b c))) Result: (15,17) It binds to nil if there’s no data, i.
